about_the_game:
In Antidotera, you step into the shoes of researcher enlisted by the government to tackle a global health crisis. A deadly epidemic is haunting the population, and finding a cure is up to you.

Sent to a mysterious, resource-rich island, you must explore its untamed wilderness to discover and harness the natural ingredients needed to develop powerful potions and medicines. The island, long abandoned and steeped in secrecy, holds untold potential—but also countless dangers. As you delve deeper into its lush forests and rugged landscapes, you'll uncover uncategorized herbs, exotic mushrooms, and other rare materials that could be the key to ending the epidemic. Your mission is clear: survive, gather, experiment, and deliver life-saving potions to the government, all while navigating the perils of the wild.

Key Features:

Exploring Resourceful Island: Venture into the heart of a deserted island teeming with untapped resources. Discover hidden herbs, mushrooms, plants, and other natural materials that could hold the secret to combating the epidemic.



Gathering Wild Materials: Scour the lush forests and rugged terrains to gather essential items. Every material you find could be crucial in your quest for survival and in creating powerful potions.



Mixing or Crafting Materials: Experiment with a variety of ingredients. Crush, cook, and combine wild herbs, fungi, and edible plants to concoct unique potions. Use your gathered resources to build shelters and sustain yourself in the wilderness.



Provide Beneficial Potions: Once you've created a potent potion, send it to the government via helicopter, which will periodically arrive to collect your latest discoveries. Your efforts will directly contribute to the fight against the epidemic.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Dive into the role of a researcher on a dangerous, resource-rich island. Gather rare ingredients, craft life-saving potions, and survive the wild. Uncover secrets and send cures back to the government to combat a deadly epidemic haunting the population.
